scripts.createvacancyscript: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VACANCY (id serial primary key, vacancyname text, vacancyhref text, vacancydata text)
scripts.createrenewalscript: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RENEWAL (id serial primary key, renewaltime text)
scripts.insertvacancyscript: INSERT INTO VACANCY (vacancyname, vacancyhref, vacancydata) SELECT ?, ?, ? WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM VACANCY WHERE vacancyname=? and vacancyhref=?)
